subtitle: Explore all projects commissioned worldwide since 2000 to produce hydrogen for energy or climate-change-mitigation purposes
subsubtitle: Explore all projects commissioned worldwide since 2000 to produce hydrogen for energy or climate-change-mitigation purposes
dataset_description: Hydrogen Projects 2022 includes this dynamic data dashboard which enables users to explore the status and scope of various projects to produce hydrogen for energy or climate-change-mitigation purposes. Future iterations of the tool will also allow users to compare Hydrogen Projects 2020, Hydrogen Projects 2021 and Hydrogen Projects 2022. The associated Hydrogen Projects 2022 dataset gives full access to all of the data available in this dashboard as well as a list of the reference collected for all projects.
